text:
Moz| Software Engineer, Index Team| Seattle, WA| Onsite, Fulltime, https://boards.greenhouse.io/moz/jobs/603984?gh_jid=603984#....

As Moz's web indexing team, we deal with petabytes of data and trillions of records. We're a small team that believes in punching above our weight. As the team's fourth engineer, you'll build novel approaches to big data in a low-process environment. Technologies used includes C++, AWS, and Linux. Company is profitable, well capitalized, and well positioned to make effective use of your efforts. Generous pay and benefits.
